mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_no, c.sender_id, m1.name AS sender_name, c.receiver_id, m2.name AS receiver_name, c.message, c.chat_date FROM chat c JOIN member m1 ON(c.sender_id = m1.member_id) JOIN member m2 ON(c.receiver_id = m2.member_id) WHERE receiver_id = #{memberId} OR sender_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY c.chat_date ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT(c.sender_id) as member_id, m.name FROM chat c JOIN member m ON(c.sender_id = m.member_id) WHERE c.receiver_id = #{memberId} UNION SELECT DISTINCT(c.receiver_id) as member_id, m.name FROM chat c JOIN member m ON(c.receiver_id = m.member_id) WHERE c.sender_id = #{memberId} ) ORDER BY name
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat(chat_no, sender_id, receiver_id, message, chat_date) VALUES(chat_id_seq.nextval, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{message}, #{chatDate})
mapper.select: select * FROM member ORDER BY name
